name: Digital Tire Pressure Gauge with Inflator, 3-250 PSI Air Compressor Accessories with Air Chuck Quick Connect Coupler, Car Attachments with Rubber Hose for Car, Truck, SUV, Cycle, RV
short_description: 【Accuracy】The digital tire pressure gauge has 4 different measurement units: PSI, KPA, BAR, KG/CM². It reads within 1% of the exact tire pressure, with a resolution of 0.1 PSI and the measuring range is 3-250 PSI (0.2-17.2 Bar; 20-1724 Kpa; 0.2-17.5 kg/cm^2)

【Durability】The tire inflator gauge is made of heavy-duty stainless steel and corrosion-resistant brass components, equipped with a sturdy rubber hose and a gear-type rubber dial, which is reliable and durable. The high-definition digital LCD display also has a light mode for use at night

【3-in-1】The tire pressure gauge includes inflation, deflation, and tire pressure checking functions. Connect it to your air compressor to inflate; press the built-in deflation valve to deflate the tire; press the power button to check tire pressure

【Compatibility】The inflation gun can be used with ¼” NPT air compressors to inflate tires. And it is very suitable for various vehicle tires, including trucks, cars, SUVs, RVs, motorcycles etc. Suitable as a gift for men and women

【Safety】Excessive tire pressure will cause blowouts, while insufficient tire pressure will cause excessive wear. A tire pressure gauge for cars can help you reduce the possibility of blowouts, explosions, and wear, improve your MPG, and save fuel costs

short_description: EXPERT-GRADE CALIBRATION: Each AstroAI Tire Pressure Gauge is calibrated with professional-grade tools, ensuring quick and accurate measurement results within plus-minus 1PSI. Stay prepared for any roadside emergency and travel with peace of mind.

SEAMLESS TESTING IN DIM AREAS: The AstroAI Digital Tire Pressure Gauge is equipped with an illuminated nozzle and backlit LCD screen. Use the illuminated nozzle to find the car valve stem in dim light. It easily forms a seal with the valve stem, and gives accurate measurements.

ONE DEVICE, FOUR UNITS: The AstroAI Digital Tire Pressure Gauge has 4 pressure measurements to choose from; 0-150PSI / 0-10Bar / 0-10Kgf/cm / 0-1000KPA. Press down the ON/UNIT/OFF button once to switch units.

STREAMLINED ERGONOMIC DESIGN: This tire pressure gauge's ergonomic build ensures a comfortable grip that's easy to hold, while its compact design allows for convenient storage anywhere, such as glove boxes or compartments.

POWER-SAVING FOR LONGER ENDURANCE: The energy-saving design with automatic shutdown after 30 seconds effectively extends battery life. The included 3 LR44 Alkaline Batteries allow you to start using it straight from the box.

CONVENIENT PRESTA-TO-SCHRADER ADAPTER: The AstroAI Digital Tire Pressure Gauge includes a Presta Valve Adapter. It's compatible with almost all vehicles' tire pressure measurements including bicycles, motorcycles, sedans, and trucks.

SUPREME-QUALITY AFTER-SALE SERVICE: This digital tire pressure gauge from the highest-quality materials. If any damages from transportation or malfunctions occur, this product can be returned. We are always dedicated to providing extraordinary products and services.

short_description: Excellent Accuracy: Engineered with high precision (±1% Accuracy) , WORKPRO digital tire pressure gauge with inflator provides excellent tire pressure measurement. It displays readings with 0.1 PSI resolution, allowing for precise inflation of tires on all vehicles and inflatable stuff

Superior Construction: This tire pressure gauge delivers lasting reliability and performance with heavy-duty aluminum alloy, rubber material and high-quality brass components. Additionally, the combination of brass and rubber provides multiple layers of protection, making our digital tire pressure gauge drop-resistant and preventing the rusting and jamming that can occur with ordinary iron air nozzles after prolonged use

Versatile Accessories: WORKPRO 12pcs tire pressure gauge with inflator delivers everything you need for precise inflation tasks. It includes a high-performance air gauge tire pressure plus 11 tire pressure gauge accessories: 4 black valve caps, 1 American ¼” I/M male adapter, 1 brass twist-on air chuck, 1 tire stem screwdriver, 2 rubber nozzles (long/short), 1 inflation needle, and 1 seal tape. Perfect for cars, motorcycles, RVs, SUVs, bicycles, trucks, and inflatable toys

Featuring a clear gauge and simple button-controlled valve operation, it ensures accurate and hassle-free tire maintenance every time (Note: An air compressor is required for use)

Easy Storage: The air pump for car tires comes with a convenient carrying bag for easy portability and storage, and includes two AAA batteries for immediate use. Additionally, tire air pressure gauge features an automatic screen-off function to conserve battery life. The screen automatically lights up when compressed air is detected, and turns off after 12 seconds of inactivity. Ideal for inflating tires while on the go and ensuring all components are assembled in case of loss

name: ETENWOLF T600 Digital Tire Pressure Gauge 0-250 PSI, ANSI B40.7 2A Grade High Precision(Plus-Minus 1%),Tire Gauge for Tire Pressure with Rubber Hose, Replaceable AA Batteries
short_description: Reliable & Accurate: The ETENWOLF T600 Digital Tire Pressure Gauge is manually calibrated to ANSI B40.7 Grade 2A standards, ensuring an impressive accuracy of ±1% PSI.

Streamlined Innovation: This tire pressure gauge features an original design, this gauge offers a more convenient and efficient user experience. A single button powers the device on/off, resets it to zero, and changes between units — all in one seamless operation.

Easy to Use: The 360° rotating nozzle allows for easy readings from any angle. Readings remain locked on the display until the power button is pressed again to reset to zero. If your tire pressure is too high, simply press the bleed button while the gauge is still attached to the tire valve to release air until the desired pressure is reached.

Wide Measurement Range: With a measurement range of 0–250 PSI, this tire gauge is suitable for a wide range of vehicles, including pickups, motorcycles, trucks, bicycles, SUVs, RVs, and ATVs. Engineered to perform reliably in both extreme cold and hot weather, it’s your trusted tire pressure companion all year round.

Premium Car Accessory: Equipped with a flexible rubber hose and a 360° rotating angled air chuck, the chuck can also be replaced with any standard 1/4-inch NPT chuck. It supports three pressure units — PSI, BAR, and KPA — and is powered by replaceable AA batteries for easy maintenance.
